sentences.en: A high seating position makes ingress and egress easy.
sentences.cn: 较高的座椅位置使入口和出口容易.

sentences.en: Bearing housings shall be effectively sealed against loss of lubricant and ingress of fluid or dirt.
sentences.cn: 轴承座应有效密封,以防止丢失的润滑剂和渗入液体或污物.

sentences.en: Bolted cover plate to protect seal and cylinder from the ingress of debris.
sentences.cn: 上盖板可防止杂物进入缸筒损坏密封.

sentences.en: Motors on the milling machines are totally enclosed to guard against ingress of metallic dust.
sentences.cn: 铣床上的电动机都是全封闭的,以防止金属粉尘进入.

sentences.en: Our scout has established that a guard patrols outside the office. This may complicate your Ingress.
sentences.cn: 我们的侦查员确定有警卫在办公室外面巡逻. 这可能会要进去大楼里面的你有些阻碍.

sentences.en: The basic reason is the steel corrosion which mainly results from ingress.
sentences.cn: 其中,氯离子又是造成钢筋锈蚀的首要原因.

sentences.en: The rear encapsulation design provides effective protection for the motor against water ingress.
sentences.cn: 采用电机与砂轮片分置,后置封装设计可有效避免电机进水.

sentences.en: The rugged construction is double-sealed to prevent water and dust ingress even during site wiring.
sentences.cn: 坚固的建筑是双重密封，以防止水和灰尘进入即使在现场布线。

sentences.en: The touch-screen surface eliminates pushbutton cavities which prevents liquid ingress.
sentences.cn: 触摸屏表面没有按钮腔，这就避免了液体的进入。

sentences.en: The units are, therefore, free ingress of harmful contaminants into the bearing chamber during mounting procedures.
sentences.cn: 因而可避免在安装轴承单元过程中有害物质进入轴承内部.

sentences.en: The water ingress alarm system for cargo hold.
sentences.cn: 船舶货舱进水报警装置.

sentences.en: There are several gates providing ingress to the meadow in this picture.
sentences.cn: 在这张画上有几个进入草地的篱笆门。

sentences.en: These were damaging the conveyor bearings through the ingress of water and contaminants.
sentences.cn: 这些都是破坏性的传送带轴承通过入水及污染物.

sentences.en: Wheel control joint corroded due to moisture ingress and worn out as a result.
sentences.cn: 车轮转向节因为进入了湿气而腐蚀,从而导致磨损的结果.

words.tran_cn: 进入；[计]入口；准许进入；入境

trans.tran_en: the right to enter a place, or the act of entering it
